name: pornographically

in a way that relates to or has the qualities of pornography (= books, magazines, films, etc. that describe or show sexual or violent acts or naked people in a way that is intended to be sexually exciting): His sex life has been scrutinized thoroughly, even pornographically, in the media. The later chapters of the novel are pornographically violent.
